author: Staff Reporter
text:
The police have rushed special teams to Tiruchi to nab the persons who had nabbed a 17-year-old Plus Two student of government higher secondary school on February 23. The boy was kidnapped outside his school by two persons. Following a complaint from the boy’s father Rajendran with the Mohanur police, the kidnappers left the boy at Valayapatti bus stop on Wednesday.

Inquiries revealed that financial dispute prevailed between Rajendran and Ganesan. Hence, Ganesan with the help of his friend kidnapped the boy. Based on information, the police are in Tiruchi to nab the accused.
title: Police hunt for kidnappers
